objects.text: • 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor • Classic Retro Design • Advanced AF System

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Classic Design Meets Modern Innovation
product_details.description:
• Premium 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• Classic retro-styled compact body with durable metal construction
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (2.36M dots)
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative shooting angles
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Film Simulation modes for unique creative expression
• Fast continuous shooting up to 8.0 fps
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Intuitive dial controls for manual shooting experience
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography

banner_details:
This banner features a high-contrast, modern promotional design showcasing a product image prominently at the center. The background employs a dark radial gradient with geometric patterns and abstract lines for a futuristic, tech-driven aesthetic. The central composition includes a hero image of a camera overlaid on circular design elements, emphasizing the product. Text layers are cleanly arranged to create a visual hierarchy: the main heading (`heading`) stands bold at the top, followed by a tagline (`subheading`) that reinforces innovation. Supporting technical features are listed in the `description`. Price (`price`) appears in a vibrant circular badge. A bold orange call-to-action button (`cta_button`, `cta`) at the bottom completes the layout. Key promotional urgency is delivered through an energetic `tagline` just above the button.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #101828
- Slate Gray: #CBD5E1 and #475569
- Vibrant Orange: #FF6B35
- Deep Orange Gradient: #F24C00
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera showcases a sleek and professional aesthetic using a predominantly monochromatic color palette. The body features a matte and gloss black finish (#000000) contrasted with silvery highlights (#C0C0C0) on dials and text, creating strong visual accents. The lens rings incorporate subtle metallic tones (#333333) and engraved white markings (#FFFFFF) for clarity. Slight pops of muted red (#CC3333) and orange (#FFA500) around the lens indicators add balance and visual interest. The blending of shiny and matte textures enhances the depth and premium feel. For an advertisement banner, a palette including black, silver, deep gray, white, red, and orange would effectively reflect the product's high-end design.
